page.title: 02RELIGION WWICKHAM WWRATTING
page.content: Church going has drastically declined in recent years. The local churches are Church of England and Methodist. Any Roman Catholics etc. have to travel.The Salvation Army run Sunday meetings in West Wickham, and Jehovah's Witnesses often call around at people's houses. {GHOSTS} The Shug Monkey which inhabits the countryside between West Wratting amd Balsham has often been written about. It is supposed to be jet black and shaggy with staring eyes in a monkey face. There are bound to be ghosts on the old wartime airfield (Wratting Common) which held 1 American and 3 RAF airforce squadrons during the last war and was then a base for Displaced Persons (from all over Europe). Most of the evidence has gone except for some farmbuildings and EEC grainstores
